markdownRemark.html:
The next JaxFusion User Group meeting will be held on April 4th at Vurv Technology in Jacksonville.

The presentation for this meeting will focus on using Ajax with ColdFusion. Here is a map to the new meeting location.

frontmatter.title: JaxFusion meeting on April 4th at Vurv Technology
Java on Mac OS X: The Silence is deafening
